# gateway Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-05

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5.x with Node.js 20 + NestJS 10.x, TypeORM 0.3.x, axios for Airtel API calls, crypto for signing (002-airtel-disbursement)
- PostgreSQL with TypeORM entities (Disbursement, DisbursementStatus enum) (002-airtel-disbursement)

- TypeScript 5.x / Node.js 20 + NestJS 10.x, TypeORM 0.3.x, axios 1.x (001-airtel-integration)

tests/

## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5.x / Node.js 20: Follow standard conventions
